TopicTitle: Mission to Moho: Journey to the Innermost Planet

Articles.Content:
This is a record (90 images) of Bill, Jebediah, and Bob's journey to Moho and the rescue efforts it took to bring them back home. I hope you enjoy.

Mods used: KAS (Kerbal Attachment System), KAC (Kerbal Alarm Clock), Kethane Pack (scanner only), and Chatterer.

Edited March 15, 2014 by Landge
Excellent work! I'm glad all the kerbals got back home safely!
Good work. Hopefully kethane operations will be easier to perform.

Thanks! The fuel used to Moho is crazy. It took my 3 ships with 10 aux fuel tanks (approximately 20 orange tanks worth) of fuel just to fill 1 aux fuel tank a little over 3/4 full. Half the fuel was definitely burned during the plane change in solar orbit which took around 40~50 minutes. The capture burn took only around 20. I'm bringing 5 aux tanks with my K2 Kethane Drilling Rig. Seen here getting outfitted in LKO.

I'll keep the tanks all the way to Moho instead of jettisoning them and use them for an orbital fuel storage depot.

Edited March 15, 2014 by Landge
